properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_CODE , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_DATE , NOTICE_VIEW FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_CODE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
